mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Marquis de Lafayette to George Washington, 1781 February 21
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lafayette, Marie Joseph Paul Yves Roch Gilbert Du Motier, marquis de, 1757-1834
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lafayette writes to George Washington from New Windsor vaguely describing an upcoming reunion. Autograph letter signed, 1 page, with integral address panel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States -- History -- Revolution, 1775-1783
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Wayne Rickert Collection of Founders' Autographs
